name: Sorting Sortilege
description:
Casual 1-Vs-1 Puzzle/Shooting game, kind of a mix between Twinkle Star Sprites and Tetris 99: fly your witch around colourful blocks, and zap them to send stacking trash blocks to your opponent's screen. There are special blocks, too...

Playable as Player 1 Vs CPU, probably more fun as Player 1 Vs Player 2, if you have a pair of Xbox controllers.
